problem.display_name: Graded question - General Challenges & Organisation Unit Management - Question 2
problem.markdown:
>>True or False: Organisation unit management has a direct effect on data quality and use? (1 attempt) <<
(x) True ( ) False
[explanation] This is a critical function as it directly impacts completeness and what types of organisation unit group sets are available to disaggregate data. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: True or False: Organisation unit management has a direct effect on data quality and use? (1 attempt)

div.p: This is a critical function as it directly impacts completeness and what types of organisation unit group sets are available to disaggregate data.
